question.text: According to Lederer Financial Consultants, a strategy to minimize borrowing is part of good debt  ___.
Today Tenopy Tech announced its plans ___ with Shaffly Energy Systems to manufacture solar panels in Quito and Caracas.
For the most current timetables, please contact the transit authority  ___.

answer.explanation: We are giving more information on the verb "contact" so we use an adverb.

question.text: To ___ the Adeleâ€™s Apparel store that is nearest to you, select your state or country from the pull-down menu.
The Silvau Division is now ___ a full line of steel products at a new modern facility just outside the city.

answer.explanation:
The answer comes after "is now" so we use present continuous tense. There is no "by" after the answer so we use the active voice "is manufacturing".
Manufacture = Produce

question.text: The ink cartridge is designed for the SZ2000 laser printer ___ should not be used with any other model.

answer.explanation: The two verbs share a subject so we use "and".

question.text: Once Ms. Cohen had examined the detailed business plan, she was more ___ to the Idea of Investing in the new company.

answer.explanation: Receptive = Willing to listen or accept

question.text: Lonan Imports will work ___ with any distributor to fulfill a customer request.

answer.explanation: We are giving more information on the verb "will work" so we use an adverb.

question.text: ___ of the passengers on flight 246 missed connecting flights in Dublin as a result of the weather delay.

answer.explanation: "Everybody", "someone", and "whom" do not go with "of" so we choose "several".

question.text: The owner of Pergini Builders estimates that the construction in downtown Erlton will take ___ eighteen months to complete.

answer.explanation:
We are giving more information on the verb "will take" so we use an adverb.
Approximately = About
